item.description:
Decided to host a meal before tax season heats up. Had a great meal at Z Square and thought it would be a good choice. So join us for a leisurely brunch at a place with a varied and reasonably priced menu.

Z Square Menu http://www.z-square.c...

MBTA:
Red Line: Harvard Square steps from Mass and JFK station entrance

Parking:
Meters: Rarely available
Validated: University Place 124 Mt. Auburn Street 617-491-0801 for $7

Rules of Engagement:

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the meal and you have not attended, it will count as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, it will count as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you to Tonya explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event by completing the survey afterward.
item.how_to_find_us: Will meet at the bar downstairs

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Z Square Last Sunday Brunch of 2007
